00018 /**

00057 /**
00058  *  @brief  Solves the bottleneck biconnected spanning subgraph problem 
00059  *          (BBSSP) on the given problem.
00060  *  @param  problem [in] problem data
00061  *  @param  info [in] problem info
00062  *  @param  result [out] BBSSP solution

00064 int

00066                   arrow_bound_result *result);
00067 
00068 /**
00069  *  @brief  Determines if the graph is biconnected using only edges with costs
00070             less than or equal to the given value.
00071  *  @param  problem [in] problem data
00072  *  @param  max_cost [in] value to check biconnectivity question against
00073  *  @param  result [out] ARROW_TRUE if biconnected, ARROW_FALSE otherwise.
00074  */
00075 int
00076 arrow_bbssp_biconnected(arrow_problem *problem, int max_cost, int *result);

00097 /**

00099  *  @param  problem [in] problem data

00101  *  @param  max_length [in] the maximum length of the assignment

00106                  double max_length, arrow_bound_result *result);

00120 /**

00122  *  @param  problem [in] problem data

00129                  double max_length, arrow_bound_result *result);
00130                  
00131 /**
00132  *  @brief  Minimum spanning tree (MST) solver.
00133  *  @param  problem [in] problem data
00134  *  @param  info [in] problem info data
00135  *  @param  tree [out] MST tree (tree[i] gives precessor for node i)
00136  *  @param  max_cost [out] the largest cost in the tree
00137  *  @param  length [out] the length of all edges in the tree
00138  */
00139 int
00140 arrow_cbst_mst_solve(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info,
00141                      int *tree, int *max_cost, double *length);
